featured.text: When the main tree dies, the sprouts are then free to grow as full trees, forming a “fairy ring” of trees around the initial tree.
What does a “fairy ring” in the last paragraph refer to? (A) Circled tree trunks.

what happens on Earth, and are responsible for quite a few legends, and that the ancient Greek and Roman gods, __(34)__ the fairies and dwarfs in many classical tales, were in fact “space people” living here.

definition.zh_def: 小精靈，通常被描繪為擁有魔法能力的女性生物，常見於童話故事中。
definition.en_def: A small imaginary being of human form that has magical powers, often depicted as having wings.
definition.example: The children believed that a fairy lived in the garden.
